pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pivotal Methods for Bayesian Relabelling and k-Means Clustering // Collection of pivotal algorithms for: relabelling the MCMC chains in order to undo the label switching problem in Bayesian mixture models; fitting sparse finite mixtures; initializing the centers of the classical k-means algorithm in order to obtain a better clustering solution. For further details see Egidi, Pappad, Pauli and Torelli (2018b)ISBN:9788891910233.
